mention.text: then a 35-year-old mayor running for the U.S. Senate

a liberal , progressive city Some , including Hayden , say that image now blocks progress '' Van Hayden think this city has to wake up Everyone always says , ` Van Hayden ca n't believe this is happening in Minnesota , in Minneapolis , the home of progressiveness

a University of Minnesota student who has been involved in recent protests In a series of rallies in recent weeks , protesters demanded that officers involved in the drug raid be suspended , charges against those arrested at the hotel be dropped , and that a citizen police review board be established City Council voted last week to study the problem '' There are bad apples in every bunch and the Minneapolis Police Department is no exception , '' said Councilwoman Sayles Belton '' Councilwoman Sayles Belton do n't think protesters -LRB- the good officers -RRB- are pleased with the few that are giving the good officers the bad rap _ the spoilers

no exception , '' said Councilwoman Sayles Belton '' Councilwoman Sayles Belton do n't think protesters -LRB- the good officers -RRB- are pleased with the few that are giving the good officers the bad rap _ the spoilers
